identity.sql: SELECT * EXCEPT (col1) FROM t
SELECT * EXCEPT (col1, col2) FROM t
SELECT * FROM a INNER JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM a LEFT JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM a RIGHT JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM a FULL OUTER JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM a CROSS JOIN b
SELECT * FROM a LEFT SEMI JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM a LEFT ANTI JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM a NATURAL JOIN b
SELECT * FROM a JOIN b USING (id)
SELECT * FROM a, b WHERE a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM t QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY x ORDER BY y) = 1
SELECT * FROM t QUALIFY RANK() OVER (ORDER BY x) <= 3
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x > 1 AND y < 10
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x > 1 OR y < 10
SELECT * FROM t WHERE NOT x > 1
SELECT * FROM t WHERE (x > 1 AND y < 10) OR z = 5
SELECT *, x + y AS total FROM t
SELECT x, y, x + y AS total FROM t
SELECT a.*, b.x FROM a JOIN b ON a.id = b.id
SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x DESC, y ASC
SELECT * FROM t LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM t GROUP BY ROLLUP (x, y)
identity.expected: SELECT * FROM t GROUP BY rollup (x, y)

identity.sql: SELECT * FROM t GROUP BY CUBE (x, y)
identity.expected: SELECT * FROM t GROUP BY cube (x, y)

identity.sql: SELECT * FROM t GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((x), (y), ())
identity.expected: SELECT * FROM t GROUP BY grouping sets ((x), (y), ())

identity.sql: SELECT * FROM t WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM s WHERE s.id = t.id)
SELECT * FROM t WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM s WHERE s.id = t.id)
SELECT * FROM unnest(ARRAY[1, 2, 3]) AS t(x)
SELECT * FROM generate_series(1, 10) AS t(x)
